import coil1 from "../Images/appliances/condenser-coil-cleaning.jpg"
import coil2 from "../Images/appliances/condenser-coil-cleaning2.jpg"


export const imageOptions = [
    [coil1, coil2],
    [wolf, wolf],
    [wolf, wolf],
    [wolf, wolf],
    [wolf, wolf],
    [wolf, wolf],
    [wolf, wolf],
    [wolf, wolf],
    [wolf, wolf],
]

export const textOptions = [
    "Regular maintenance of a refrigerator is crucial to ensure it runs efficiently and maintains optimal cooling, which helps in preserving food quality and safety. It also extends the appliance's lifespan, prevents breakdowns, and reduces energy consumption, saving money on repairs and utility bills.",
"Regular maintenance of a washing machine helps in prolonging its lifespan and ensuring optimal performance. It also prevents common issues such as clogs, inefficiency, and breakdowns, saving time and money in the long run.",
"Regular maintenance of a dryer is essential to ensure it operates efficiently and safely, preventing issues like overheating and lint buildup. It also extends the appliance's lifespan and improves energy efficiency, ultimately saving costs on repairs and energy bills.",
"Regular maintenance of a range is essential for ensuring consistent cooking performance and energy efficiency, as well as for preventing potential safety hazards like gas leaks or electrical issues. It also extends the appliance's lifespan and helps to avoid costly repairs and replacements.",
"Regular maintenance of a cooktop is important to ensure its efficient and safe operation, helping to prevent issues like uneven heating and potential fire hazards. Proper upkeep also extends the lifespan of the appliance and helps maintain its appearance and functionality over time.",
"Regular maintenance of an oven is crucial for ensuring consistent and accurate cooking temperatures, which is key for food safety and quality. It also helps in extending the appliance's lifespan, reducing the likelihood of breakdowns and costly repairs.",
"Regular maintenance of a dishwasher is vital for ensuring effective cleaning and optimal performance, as it helps to prevent issues like clogs, leaks, and buildup of food particles and limescale. It also extends the lifespan of the appliance and helps to conserve water and energy, leading to cost savings on utility bills and potential repairs.",
"Regular maintenance of washers and dryers is essential for ensuring they operate efficiently and safely, preventing issues like water leaks, lint buildup, and overheating. This upkeep not only extends the lifespan of these appliances but also improves their performance and energy efficiency, leading to savings on utility bills and costly repairs.",
"Regular maintenance of a garbage disposal is crucial to prevent clogs and mechanical failures, ensuring it operates smoothly and efficiently. Proper upkeep also helps to eliminate odors and extend the lifespan of the unit, avoiding the need for premature replacements.",
]
